name: 740 Racing
summary: A sandbox-like drifting and racing game in an open world.

name: 7:45, Densha Nite.
summary:
A rural train station during the day, where there are people scattered all over the place.
At this time of day, most students were supposed to be at school, but the boy was there.
A boy, wearing a school uniform, looks down at the train tracks from the platform.
The protagonist, who was drunk, called out to the boy.

A short visual novel about the strange friendship between an office worker and a middle school student.

name: 747 Landing Simulator
summary: One of the games published under the Atari Program eXchange line, written by William J. Graham. Includes weather conditions and visibility
